text.title: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL

head.s: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL

p.s: By providing excellent telephone and broadband services in Bombay and Delhi at affordable price , MTNL has become the choice of many people .
Many people take internet plans limited to a few GB data usage and hence it becomes necessary for them to regularly keep themselves updated with their data usage details .
Below are given some easy steps to do so .

list.item:
Login to MTNL website for this .
Just type
http://register.mtnldelhi.in/jsp/customer/Login.jsp
in the address bar of your web browser and press Enter .

item.s: As a web page requesting for username and password comes up have your land line telephone number(through which you are accessing internet ) and Customer Account number with you .
Customer Account number can be found on your telephone bill under the title C/A no .

figure.rend: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Enter your telephone number as your Username and Customer Account number as your Password .
Click on Login .
While entering telephone number as username DON'T enter STD code in the beginning .
For example : if your telephone number is 27051744 and customer account number is ********** ( it is a unique 10 digit numeric code ) , then your username is:27051744 and password is ********** .
The site provides you with the option to use Virtual Keyboard as well in case you do n't have a keyboard with you .

figure.rend: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL Step 3 Version 2.jpg

item.s: As a new web page opens up find links like : Home , My info , Email Account , Usage information , Customer Care etc.

figure.rend: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click on Usage Information .

figure.rend: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL Step 5 Version 2.jpg

item.s: View your usage limit , unbilled usage , total free and other important details .
Also you will be shown the duration for which this data is presented .
You can change this duration to obtain similar statistics for other duration also .
Now click on Search .

figure.rend: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL Step 6 Version 2.jpg

item.s: The result will be displayed in tabular form showing all the details of your upload , download and total data volume .
Start and end time ( date wise ) is also shown .

figure.rend: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL Step 7 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Read , note down or download these details as per your convenience .
Download button is provided in the bottom .

figure.rend: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL Step 8 Version 2.jpg

item.s: After completing your work log out from this website .

figure.rend: Check Internet Data Usage in MTNL Step 9 Version 2.jpg

list.item: Log out after your work is over to ensure security of your account .

item.s: Enter your Username and Password carefully .
While entering telephone number as username DON'T enter STD code in the beginning .
Change the password if you wish to increase your account security .
Remember put " @a " at end of your phone number for eg .
If your number is 28581515 type it as 28581515@a .
This is because this is how the MTNL saves our number in their database .
Your password will be your C. A number .
Refer to your MTNL bill or call MTNL office to know your CA number .
If you got error that your Password is wrong please do n't give that same password many times because it will cause your number getting locked .
And it will be pain to unlock it again
If you do n't understand anything then do n't proceed ask MTNL customer care for any help
